options.name: view
options.description: Get your (or someone else's) leaderboard rank

options.name: user
options.description: The user to look up (defaults to you)

options.name: timeframe
options.description: Whether to get the season or lifetime leaderboard

options.name: track
options.description: Start or stop gaining XP for your messages

options.name: choice
options.description: Whether or not to track XP

options.name: xp
options.description: [MOD] Give or take XP from a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose XP you want to modify

options.name: xp
options.description: The amount of XP to give/take (positive number to give, negative to take)

options.name: exclude-role
options.description: Add or remove a role from the excluded roles list

options.name: exclude-channel
options.description: Add or remove a channel from the excluded channels list

options.name: reward
options.description: Add or remove a role to give at a certain level

options.name: reward-level
options.description: What level should the reward be given at?

options.name: level-rate
options.description: A number between 1 and 10 (2 is default) to determine how fast you gain levels (lower = faster)
